### populateConstraintAttachments

### weld

```luau
function KitStdPhysics.weld(
	trove: trove.Trove,
	target: BasePart,
	weldToTarget: BasePart,
	unanchorTarget: boolean?

): WeldConstraint

```

Welds the `weldToTarget` to the `target`. Optionally unanchors the
`weldToTarget`.
